docs.title: AstroBot Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the AstroBot documentation! This guide will help you get started with AstroBot, a sophisticated Discord bot for Minecraft server management, Twitch integration, and AI-powered community management.

docs.title: What is AstroBot?
docs.text: AstroBot is a multifunctional Discord bot designed to revolutionize Minecraft server management through intelligent AI-driven interfaces and automated workflows. It combines powerful AI features with Twitch integration to provide a comprehensive solution for gaming communities.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• Minecraft Integration: Manage your Minecraft server directly from Discord
  • AI-Powered Assistance: Leverage advanced AI models including GPT-4o and Claude 3.5
  • Twitch Integration: Transform Discord into a Twitch-powered community engine
  • Customization: Extensive options for personalizing bot behavior and appearance
  • Web Dashboard: Comprehensive web interface for managing all bot features
  • Premium Features: Enhanced capabilities for power users and community builders

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Check out the Getting Started guide to begin your journey with AstroBot.

docs.title: Why AstroBot?
docs.text:

docs.title: API Reference
docs.text: AstroBot provides a RESTful API for integrating with external services.

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text: All API requests require authentication using an API key.

docs.title: Obtaining an API Key
docs.text:
1. Log in to the web dashboard
  2. Go to Settings > API
  3. Generate a new API key

docs.title: Using the API Key
docs.text:
Include the API key in the request header:

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY

docs.title: Bot Status
docs.text:
GET /api/status

Returns the current status of the bot.

docs.title: Minecraft Server
docs.text:
GET /api/minecraft/status

Returns the status of the Minecraft server.

GET /api/minecraft/players

Returns a list of online players.

docs.title: Twitch Integration
docs.text:
GET /api/twitch/status

Returns the status of the Twitch integration.

POST /api/twitch/notify

Toggle Twitch stream notifications.

docs.title: AI-Powered Development
docs.text:
This project uses AI-powered GitHub Actions to help with development tasks. You can:

  1. Use the @ai command in issue comments to get AI assistance
  2. Automatically get AI-suggested fixes for bugs
  3. Leverage AI for code review and improvement suggestions

docs.title: Using AI Commands
docs.text:
You can use these commands in issue and PR comments:

  • @ai explain - Explain code or concepts
  • @ai fix - Suggest fixes for issues
  • @ai implement - Implement requested features
  • @ai optimize - Optimize existing code
  • @ai test - Generate test cases
  • @ai document - Create documentation

docs.title: Getting Started with AstroBot
docs.text: This guide will help you get started with AstroBot, from installation to basic usage.

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
Before installing AstroBot, make sure you have:

  • Python 3.11 or higher
  • Node.js 20 or higher
  • PostgreSQL database
  • Discord Bot Token (for bot functionality)
  • Twitch API credentials (for Twitch integration)

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository:
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/astrobot.git
cd astrobot
  1. Install dependencies:
pip install -r requirements.txt
npm install

  1. Set up environment variables (see .env.example)

  2. Initialize the database:

python -m flask db upgrade
  1. Start the application:
python main.py

docs.title: Inviting the Bot to Your Discord Server
docs.text:
1. Go to the Discord Developer Portal
  2. Select your application
  3. Go to the "OAuth2" tab
  4. In the "OAuth2 URL Generator", select the "bot" scope
  5. Select the required permissions
  6. Copy the generated URL and open it in your browser
  7. Select the server to invite the bot to

docs.title: Basic Commands
docs.text:
• !help - Display help message
  • !status - Check bot status
  • !config - Configure bot settings

docs.title: AstroBot User Guide
docs.text: This guide covers all the features and functionality of AstroBot.

docs.title: General Commands
docs.text: Command Description !help Display help message !status Check bot status !config Configure bot settings

docs.title: Minecraft Integration
docs.text: Command Description !mc status Check Minecraft server status !mc players List online players !mc whitelist add <player> Add player to whitelist

docs.title: Twitch Integration
docs.text: Command Description !twitch link <channel> Link Twitch channel !twitch live Check if channel is live !twitch notify Toggle stream notifications

docs.title: Web Dashboard
docs.text: The web dashboard provides a user-friendly interface for managing your AstroBot configuration.

docs.title: Accessing the Dashboard
docs.text:
1. Ensure the web server is running
  2. Open your browser and navigate to http://localhost:5000
  3. Log in with your credentials

docs.title: Dashboard Features
docs.text:
• Overview: General statistics and status
  • Bot Settings: Configure bot behavior
  • Minecraft: Manage Minecraft integration
  • Twitch: Configure Twitch integration
  • Commands: Customize and manage commands
  • Logs: View bot activity logs

docs.title: Premium Features
docs.text:
AstroBot offers premium features for enhanced functionality:

  • Custom Bot Appearance: Customize bot name and avatar
  • Advanced Analytics: Detailed usage and performance metrics
  • Priority Support: Get faster support from our team
  • Extended Integrations: Additional third-party service integrations

docs.title: Upgrading to Premium
docs.text: Visit the Premium tab in the dashboard to view plans and upgrade your subscription.
